# Get Bananas - Complete Documentation

> A hand-drawn shopping list app designed for families who want beautiful, private, synced grocery management

## Product Overview

Get Bananas is a shopping list app that combines a cozy, hand-drawn aesthetic with modern cloud synchronization. Built for families who want to manage groceries together without compromising on privacy or design quality.

## Core Features

### iCloud Sync
- Instant synchronization across all devices
- No account required beyond Apple ID
- Real-time updates when family members modify lists
- Works offline with sync on reconnection

### Hand-Drawn Design
- Unique hand-drawn visual aesthetic
- Personal, warm feeling unlike clinical list apps
- Custom illustrations and icons
- Consistent design language throughout

### Apple Watch Support
- Standalone watchOS app
- Check items off from your wrist while shopping
- Quick glance at remaining items
- Haptic feedback on completion

### Claude Desktop Integration
- Hands-free list management on macOS
- Natural language item adding
- Voice-based list creation
- Powered by Anthropic's Claude AI

### Privacy-First Architecture
- Zero tracking or analytics
- Data stored in user's personal iCloud
- No third-party data sharing
- No accounts beyond Apple ID

### Automatic Sections
- Intelligently group items by category
- Create custom sections
- Drag and drop organization
- Collapsible section views

### Language Support
- 30+ languages fully localized
- Automatic language detection
- Regional formatting support

## Platform Availability

### iOS (iPhone & iPad)
- Native SwiftUI app
- Optimized for all screen sizes
- iOS 17.0+ required

### macOS
- Native Mac app
- Menu bar quick access
- Keyboard shortcuts

### watchOS
- Standalone Apple Watch app
- Complications support
- Quick item checking

## User Experience

### Creating Lists
1. Tap + to create new list
2. Give it a name (e.g., "Weekly Groceries")
3. Add items by typing or voice
4. Items auto-categorize into sections

### Sharing with Family
1. Tap share button on any list
2. Invite family members via iCloud
3. Changes sync instantly for everyone
4. See who added/checked items

### Shopping Mode
1. Open list when at store
2. Check items as you shop
3. Checked items move to bottom
4. Clear checked items when done

## Technical Details

### iOS App
- SwiftUI native interface
- SwiftData local storage
- CloudKit for sync
- No external dependencies

### Web Marketing Site
- FastAPI backend
- HTMX + Alpine.js frontend
- Bootstrap 5 styling
- Jinja2 templates

## Target Audience

- Families managing shared grocery lists
- Couples coordinating household shopping
- Individuals wanting a beautiful list app
- Privacy-conscious users
- Apple ecosystem users
